bibl.title: Thirteen Drinking Cups.
Enthousiamos. Essays on Greek and Related Pottery presented to J.M. Hemelrijk
bibl.author: Lunsingh Scheurleer, Robert A.

bibl.note: Early Ptolemaic two-handled drinking cups from the Memphite faience factories.
Lunsingh Scheurleer Robert A., Thirteen Drinking Cups.
H.A.G. Brijder, A.A. Drukker and C.W. Neeft (Edd.), Enthousiamos. Essays on Greek and Related Pottery presented to J.M. Hemelrijk = Allard Pierson Series. 6 (Amsterdam, 1986) pp. 147-156, 11 figg.
